name: PayTheDoor
description:
Controllable with arrow keys or w,a,s,d.  Fire with spacebar. Turning with mouse.

Couldn't solve some bug issues and had only 10h for this game :) So I hope you enjoy it anyway.  There suposted to be levels which increase Enemy levels so it would get harder to pass. Also the reset stage function doesn't work but at 2am my brain said "bye bye"
